channel.title: Help please (:
channel.description: Hey Guys. I am trying to change my crown in-game for my server. But i go through all my client files searching for the current Crown on my server but i cannot find it? Is it client sided if so where abouts? It's a Delta Client.

item.title: Help please (:
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

Near_hell:

Look in your Sprites File in your Client folder r and look through them you might see a Admin sign " so with ur other Sprite item put it in the folder were your admin crown is and then rename the crown u want to the admin crown name below and then Change the “old admin crown” to a different name then it makes no affect or remove thank you -Near_Hell

Thanks man that helped me

Read full topic
